description: This resource creates a Registry for authoring schemas as part of Glue Schema Registry.

Key.description: A key to identify the tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
A key to identify the tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: Corresponding tag value for the key.
Value.markdownDescription:
Corresponding tag value for the key.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: Name of the registry to be created of max length of 255, and may only contain letters, numbers, hyphen, underscore, dollar sign, or hash mark.  No whitespace.
Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the registry to be created of max length of 255, and may only contain letters, numbers, hyphen, underscore, dollar sign, or hash mark.  No whitespace.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.description: A description of the registry. If description is not provided, there will not be any default value for this.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description of the registry. If description is not provided, there will not be any default value for this.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: List of tags to tag the Registry
Tags.markdownDescription:
List of tags to tag the Registry

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Amazon Resource Name for the created Registry.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name for the created Registry.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-(cn|us-gov|iso(-[bef])?))?:glue:.*  
Update requires: No interruption
